text: ye’inezīya genizebochachewini be’ālahi menigedi yemīlegisu sewochi (ligisina) misalē beyezelelawi hulu meto k’init’ati yalebachewini sebati zelelawochi inide ābek’elechi ānidīti k’init’ati bit’ē newi፡፡ ālahimi lemīshawi sewi (kezīhi belayi) yanebabirali፡፡ ālahimi chirotawi sefī ‘āwak’ī newi፡፡
